reviews.review: People running around in competitive with 15 ping. GG for all those that dont have it, they get to peek a corner...adjust their aim for a few seconds, take a screen pic of you, write a caption...resume the game and shoot you. If you don't have insane internet, you peek a corner...nothing is there...BOOM you're instantly dead! killed by the invisible man. Until they set a low ping cap...meaning (clients cant be below a certain ping...say 30 to 40) Its basically impossible if you have higher ping to be competitive.  Unfair advantage to those who live in an area where faster internet is available. Needs fixed.
